content:
Authority:
  Organization: "CDISC"
Check:
  ^all|any$:
    - ...
    - Name: "TRM v3.0"
      context: ""
      date_component: 
      name: ""
      operator: not_equal_to
        
      order: asc | dsc
      ordering: ""
      prefix: 12345
      suffix: 12345
      target: ""
      value: "TMF"
      value_is_literal: true
      within: ""
Citations:
  - Cited Guidance: "A further grouping or classification of the category for the topic of the finding, event, or intervention. The category is in --CAT."
    Document: ""
    Item: ""
    Section: ""
Core:
  Id: "CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0027"
  Version: "1"
Description: "Trigger error when --SCAT is not null and --SCAT is equal to --CAT"
Match Datasets:
  - Name: ""
    Is Relationship: true
    Keys:
      - ""
Operations:
  - domain: ""
    group:
      - ""
    id: ""
    name: ""
    operator: >-
      distinct | dy | extract_metadata | max | max_date | mean | min | min_date
      | variable_exists | variable_names | ...
Outcome:
  Message: "--SCAT is equal to --CAT"
  Output Variables:
    - "--SCAT"
    - "--CAT"
References:
  - Origin: "SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules"
    Rule Identifier:
      Id: "CG0027"
      Version: "1"
    Version: "2.0"
  - Origin: ADaM Conformance Rules
    Rule Identifier:
      Id: ""
    Version: "4.0"
  - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
    Rule Identifier:
      Id: ""
      Version: 1 | 2 | 3
    Version: "2.0"
  - Origin: SEND Conformance Rules
    Rule Identifier:
      Id: ""
    Version: "4.0"
Rule Type: Range & Range & Limit
Scopes:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - All
  Data Structures:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Datasets:
    Exclude:
      - ""
    Include:
      - ""
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - ""
    Include:
      - "All"
    include_split_datasets: true | false
  Standards:
    - Name: "SDTMIG"
      Version: '3.4'
  Subclasses:
    Exclude:
      - ADVERSE EVENT
      - ALL
      - MEDICAL DEVICE TIME-TO-EVENT
      - NON-COMPARTMENTAL ANALYSIS
      - TIME-TO-EVENT
    Include:
      - ADVERSE EVENT
      - ALL
      - MEDICAL DEVICE TIME-TO-EVENT
      - NON-COMPARTMENTAL ANALYSIS
      - TIME-TO-EVENT
Sensitivity: Record
Severity: Warning
Check:
  all:
    - name: --SCAT
    operator: non_empty
    - name: --SCAT
    operator: equal_to
    value: --CAT
